short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store and instantly visit your top web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Top Pages allows you to store and quickly access your favorite web pages.
The process is simple:
1. Get the URL of your favorite web pages (Note: not all web pages work with Top Pages. If nothing shows up, your website is not allowed to be embedded).
2. Click on Top Pages
3. Insert the URL in any of the textboxes in the extension and see your website get rendered.
4. Enjoy your favorite websites at any point.

Features:
-Store and instantly access up to 9 websites
-Indefinite storage of websites (meaning you can close the extension and your websites will still be there when you return)
-Direct and simple UI
-Much more
